section.heading: Definitions.
section.text: For the purposes of this chapter, the term:

para.text: "Community use" means the recreational use of school facilities without a permit by any member of the community.
"DCPS" means the District of Columbia Public Schools.
"High-need community" means a neighborhood cluster, as that term is defined in ยง 38-2801.01(2E), where at least 50% of school-aged children qualify for free or reduced-price school meals.
"School facility" means a field, playground, gymnasium, multipurpose room, and other area used for recreation under the control of DCPS.
